All Classes

  • All Classes Class Summary Enum Summary Annotation Types Summary 
    Class Description
    ContentType
    IMDb content types include "movie" "TV episode", etc.
    ContentTypeController
    See the Content Type bean.
    Controller
    The bridge between specific bean controllers and the generic data access object.
    DaoData<T extends DemoBean>
    Used to handle SQL request and response data.
    DemoAccessManager
    Not used in this demo, but this is where access controls would be implemented, e.g.
    DemoApp
    Uses Javalin as the web server.
    DemoBean
    All Demo JavaBeans inherit from this class.
    DemoJetty
    Configuration of the embedded Jetty server is controlled here, including activation of HTTPS and HTTP/2.
    DemoProperties
    Accesses the webdemo.properties file.
    DemoSessionHandler
    Configures the Jetty built-in session tracker.
    DemoSqlLogger
    Logs SQL statements, including their bind parameters and execution times.
    DemoTemplateEngine
    The Thymeleaf template engine can be configured here.
    FirstOrBoth
    For a pair of fields, ensures there cannot be a value in only the second field.
    FirstOrBothValidator
    For a pair of fields, verify that both have values, or only the first one has a value, or both are null.
    HttpStatus
    Translates HTTP status numbers to descriptions (e.g.
    JdbiDAO
    The data access object, in which all data access is via the JDBI library.
    JdbiDS
    The Data Source object which controls access to the underlying database.
    LoggerUtils
    Handles automatic logging of all HTTP requests, and formatting of log messages.
    Mandatory
    See MandatoryValidator for details.
    MandatoryValidator
    Controls which fields in a data bean cannot be null.
    NotLessThanOther
    See NotLessThanOtherValidator.
    NotLessThanOtherValidator
    For a pair of numeric fields, verify that the second field does not have a value which is less than the first field's value.
    Path  
    Path._Country  
    Path._MainTemplates  
    Path._Talent  
    Path._Title  
    StringCleanser
    Removes or replaces selected characters from an input string.
    Talent
    IMDb actors, directors, producers, etc.
    TalentController
    See the Talent bean.
    TalentInTitle
    For a given title, this represents one of the talent (actors, director, etc.) who worked on the title.
    TalentInTitleController
    See the TalentInTitle bean.
    Title
    IMDb movies, TV episodes, etc.
    TitleController
    See the Title bean.
    TitleForTalent
    For a given talent (person) , this represents one title on which the talent worked (e.g as an actor, director, producer, etc.).
    Utils
    Miscellaneous utilities for handling HTML form data, related TitleDemo JavaBean objects, and textual data.
    ValidationError
    A convenience class for handling validation errors.
    ValidationHandler
    Executes Hibernate validation checks.
